    AmerisourceBergen Overview

    www.amerisourcebergen.com
    Conshohocken, PA
    10000+ employees
    2001
    Company - Public (ABC)
    Biotech & Pharmaceuticals
    $10+ billion (USD) per year
    AmerisourceBergen.
    We are united in our responsibility to create healthier futures.

    Company Updates

    • AmerisourceBergen
      190 days ago

      At the end of the healthcare supply chain is a patient in need of medication. And in the face of a natural disaster like Hurricane Michael, we remain steadfast in our commitment to putting those patients first. At Oncology Supply, our associates filled more than double our typical order volume ahead of the storm despite a town curfew limiting hours. All hands were on deck to pick, pack and ship medications, including office workers who jumped in to support warehouse staff. Our dedicated associates filled every order in time and everyone made it home safely. The needs of patients don’t change in emergency situations like a natural disaster and neither does our commitment.

    • AmerisourceBergen
      200 days ago

      The AmerisourceBergen Foundation awarded a $247,000 grant to the Health Care Improvement Foundation to support the launch of a pilot program that aims to help prevent chronic opioid use among post-surgical patients. Read more about the program here: http://glassdoor.com/slink.htm?key=vQrxV

      The Health Care Improvement Foundation Receives $247,000 Grant to Help Prevent Opioid Misuse among Post-Surgical Patients

    AmerisourceBergen – Why Work For Us?

    Our Purpose

    • Our Purpose
    • Our People
    • Diversity
    • Community
    • Our Process

    Our patients depend on us to deliver life-saving medication, and our associates depend on us to foster an environment of diversity, inclusion and patient-centered care. By putting people first and maximizing our impact at the center of healthcare delivery, we fuel growth, move marketers and enable access to care for millions each day. AmerisourceBergen connects the healthcare industry, applying innovation toward everything from the way pharmaceuticals are sourced and distributed to the delivery of personalized patient care. To improve the treatment journey for each patient, helping them gain access to, afford, and stay on vital therapies that enhance their quality of life. 

    We are united in our responsibility to create healthier futures.

    Read more

    We are committed to our people. We provide our associates with access to professional development, competitive and advanced health and wellness programs, ongoing educational opportunities and culture that celebrates diversity and inclusion, while taking care of our communities by helping them get access to quality care. And we’re building a more sustainable environment while fostering innovation, driving operational efficiency and reducing cost. Here are just a few examples of how we celebrate putting people first.

    • Recognized as a great place to work in many of our major office locations several years in a row: Philadelphia, PA; Tampa, FL; Ft. Mill, SC; Cincinnati, OH
    • Named a DiversityInc Noteworthy Company in 2017 and 2018
    • #12 on Fortune 500 List
    • #19 on Forbes’ Most Innovative Companies
    • 100% Corporate Equality Index (CEI) in 2018   
    Read more

    We celebrate individuality and act as a community throughout everything we do at AmerisourceBergen. We are proud to promote a welcoming environment for associates from all backgrounds where inclusivity and respect in the workplace are at the core of our culture. We encourage community through our Employee Resource Groups: LGBTAllies, Women’s Impact Network and Veterans in Action. We also feel strongly that military service members possess the leadership qualities we look for in potential candidates. We offer veterans a variety of career opportunities across the AmerisourceBergen network. Learn more about some of our Veteran Success Stories here. 

    Read more

    At AmerisourceBergen, our enterprise-wide commitment to good Corporate Citizenship is rooted in our Purpose. We are building healthier futures by fostering a positive impact on the environment and society through the work we do, with the people who do it, and in the communities we serve. Read more in our Corporate Citizenship Report.  

    Read more

    We invite you to be a part of the future of healthcare. AmerisourceBergen connects pharmacies, providers and patients with the products they need. From warehouse and customer service associates to sales executives and IT talent, our associates embody our promise to customers and are united in our responsibility to create healthier futures. Learn about some of our careers by clicking on the featured videos below.

    What you can expect when you apply to a position with AmerisourceBergen

    • A completed application will be reviewed against the qualifications for the position.
    • If qualified, additional screening will occur, which may include an assessment test, phone screen or interview. Depending on the position, there may be several steps in the stage.
    • If you are selected for a position, you will need to successfully complete a pre-employment background check, which includes a drug screen and criminal check. Depending on the role, additional checks may be required.
    • You will receive communication throughout the process on your application status.

    Tips for applying toa position at AmerisourceBergen

    • Review the job posting and apply to positions that match your qualifications and experiences.
    • Complete the application and submit a resume or LinkedIn profile.
    • If selected for a phone screen or interview, please respond promptly. AmerisourceBergen primarily communicates via email. Please ensure you include a valid email address in your application and you check your email often.
    • Be ready for the phone screen or interview. Do your research on the company and ask good questions.

    AmerisourceBergen is committed to providing equal employment opportunity without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, national origin, age, disability, veteran status or membership in any other class protected by federal, state or local law.

     

    Sales Careers

    Every day our sales executives ensure a seamless transition of medication from distribution over to the patient. You are on the frontline with the customer each day. Some of the key traits that we look for in our sales executives are passion about what you do, passion about healthcare and respect for the healthcare industry. At AmerisourceBergen, the sales executive position is seen as a launching pad for the rest of your career. If you are a natural-born leader, charismatic, passionate about succeeding, innovative, and you want to be the driver of your own career, then this is the career for you.


    Information Technologies Careers

    Information Technologies (IT) at AmerisourceBergen doesn’t just mean technology; that is only a small part of what we do. Our IT department works very closely with the business to drive healthcare forward, working with cutting edge technology. We work on cloud solutions, develop e-commerce platforms and ordering systems and run SAP, SAP HANA, SAP Hybris, Java, J2ee, Oracle, SQL Server and .net. We embrace people who challenge us to continually improve. We were ranked #19 most innovative companies in the world by Forbes in 2018.  In an IT career with AmerisourceBergen, you’re providing value back into the supply chain; you can influence what goes on in the business and in the healthcare industry at large. If you’re a person who wants to build systems and solutions that drive a better patient experience, then this is the place for you.


    Clinical / Nursing

    The role of a Registered Nurse is rapidly evolving. Nurses are no longer only working at the bedside, but are needed in nontraditional settings such as those offered through the nursing opportunities at Lash Group, part of AmerisourceBergen. Lash Group employs over 300 nurses throughout the country. Our nurses work with patients either via phone or in the field. Lash Group nurses are empowering patients to remain adherent to life-changing therapies. We are looking for nurses who are committed to providing patient-centered care, embrace change, and welcome new technology.


    Warehouse Associate

    The role of a Warehouse Associate is critical to enhance patient care within the pharmaceutical supply chain. We are looking for applicants who have a solid work ethic and are excited to work in a fast-paced environment. You will be responsible for picking customer orders on a multi-level mezzanine, packing and shipping orders, and troubleshooting problems to resolution. You will be expected to understand all aspects of production and adhere to strict safety, quality, compliance critical and production standards. Attendance and punctuality are important traits for this role as patients depend on you for their medication.


    Warehouse Associate - Spanish translation


    Internships

    AmerisourceBergen’s summer internship program offers the opportunity to gain valuable real-world business experience and make a meaningful contribution in a team-oriented environment. Our interns can expect to be challenged and feel connected and valued by the AmerisourceBergen community. Before you finish your education, get a head start on your career with an internship at AmerisourceBergen. Learn More.

    Read more

      Application

      I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at AmerisourceBergen in September 2018.

      Interview

      I interviewed with the director of tech support as well as the supervisor over the department. After my first interview I was invited back for a second interview. As of now I am waiting to hear back.

      Interview Questions

      • They asked non-conventional interview questions which I feel let's them get a better understanding of each person interviewed.   Answer Question
